Dear Blokes,

Those of you looking at the Lot 180 tanto on page 66 of Christie's
"CHOSHU-7085A" sale tomorrow might like to compare it to how it looked in 1991.
See Lot 360 in Sotheby's "6152 TOKAIDO" sale in New York April 24 & 25 1991.

Regards,

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)
